title: The Second Wave of Russia's Oil Shock Is Starting
itunes:title: The Second Wave of Russia's Oil Shock Is Starting
description:
Bloomberg Opinion Energy and Commodities Columnist Javier Blas discusses his book The World for Sale: Money, Power, and the Traders Who Barter the Earth’s Resources.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
